Introduction
This topic contains information on requests to VA concerning a State bonus or tax exemption, including
when to provide information to a State
nature of information to provide to a State
, and
when to provide certification without further rating action
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section B - Request for Information Regarding State Bonus or Tax Exemption
citation: Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section B
